data.name: Find The Solution
data.description:
```
Dear Stranger,

finally someone has found this letter. If you are reading this,
it   probably   means   that   I   have   vanished   into   the 
darkness... (of my room)

The  last  thing I remember is this Kata. The  author  promised
me that it is  easy, but  I  failed  as  there  were  no  clear
instructions.   There   was   nothing:  no  function   and   no
tests.  The  only  tip  he  gave  me  was  to   "look"   around.

I  only  found  a  class called  "Secret"  but  it doesn't seem
to do anything. I   found   it   in   the   preloaded  section!

After  an  hour  or so I gave up and decided that I have better 
things to do.

You  are  my  last  hope!  Maybe  you  can  solve this  riddle!


Sincerely,
zer0_b1t
```
